title: Clashes Erupt in Northern Afghanistan as Taliban Pursue Talks With Former Foes
content:
1. Clashes Erupt in Northern Afghanistan as Taliban Pursue Talks With Former Foes  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Afghan fighters recapture territory from Taliban as pockets of armed resistance emerge across country  Yahoo News
  3. Taliban's co-founder has arrived in Kabul - BBC News  BBC News
  4. Local Forces Retake 3 Districts From Taliban in Baghlan | TOLOnews  TOLOnews
  5. I was in Kabul when it fell to the Taliban. The speed of the collapse stunned me  The Guardian

localize.title: アフガニスタン北部での衝突は、タリバンがかつての敵との交渉を進めているためです。
